entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon then becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
